name: Up and Down (itch) (lights+blue)
description:
Up and down is a music-based side scroller where your two options are to go up or down. The only controls are the up and down arrow keys, which you can use to teleport up or down into a wall. The game has three levels, which go from a tutorial to a final test of skill. Good luck.

Made in unity, Music made in OpenMPT
